title: India v/s South Africa: After umpire Aleem Dar, Pak commentators Akram, Akhtar pull out of fifth ODI in Mumbai over security hazard
text: Fearing more such protests, the Akram and Akhtar decided to from the Star Sports commentary team for the October 25 match. Â»
